description: Explore and search fal models to find the right fit for your tasks. Generate content with any model and manage queued runs by checking status, fetching results, and cancelling when needed. Upload files and get shareable URLs for use in your runs.

apiKey.description: Your fal.ai API key (get one at https://fal.ai)

capabilities.name: models
capabilities.description: List available models on fal.ai. Use pagination to avoid listing all models at once.

capabilities.name: search
capabilities.description: Search for models on fal.ai based on keywords

capabilities.name: schema
capabilities.description: Get the OpenAPI schema for a specific fal.ai model

capabilities.name: generate
capabilities.description: Generate content using a fal.ai model. Supports both direct and queued execution.

capabilities.name: result
capabilities.description: Get the result of a queued request using the response_url

capabilities.name: status
capabilities.description: Check the status of a queued request using the status_url

capabilities.name: cancel
capabilities.description: Cancel a queued request using the cancel_url

capabilities.name: upload
capabilities.description: Upload a file to fal.ai storage and get a CDN URL
